page.title: 04Industry in Solihull
page.content: The main industrial area in our part of{Solihull}is the{Cranmore Industrial {Estate,}just off the Stratford road. The mainly brick buildings are screened with hedges and trees. There are approximately 40 firms manufacturing a variety of products from gateaux to machine tools. The largest factory covered 70,000 sq. feet and employed 320 people. The smallest covered 3000 sq. feet and employed 3. Many buiuldings were two stories high. 2/3 of the work force were men, many women worked part time. There are few young trainees. Some of the firms were over a century old, moving to the estate over the past 47 years. Carrs Paper Ltd. was the first. About half the firms exported goods to most areas of the world.
